nodes.text: NI-L8 was a black RA-7 protocol droid of the Galactic Empire who was active aboard the second Death Star during 4 ABY.

NI-L8 is included in a LEGO toy set released in 2021. The set's package cover depict the droid serving alongside a stormtrooper and a TIE fighter pilot in a TIE Fighter hangar aboard the second Death Star.
